Open Performance Data Initiative (OPDI)

Period

1/2022 - 8/2025

Flights

+58M

Events

+1.3B

Measurements

+2.7B

Second version available

The second iteration of the OPDI flight list, flight events and measurements is now available! Now extended to up until June 2025 (incl.). See the description in Methodology and download the data under Data.

In addition, get a preview of the data under Data Preview.

Data

The flight data made available is published under the Open Performance Data Initiative (OPDI) as sponsored by the Performance Review Commission and in collaboration with the OpenSky Network (OSN).

Download the data here.

Concepts

To learn more about the concepts used within the OPDI data tables, see the Concepts.

Methodology

The description of the algorithms used to identify flights, flight events and compute the measurements are described under Methodology.

About

To learn more about the initiative, see About.
